item.title: Need help with this code
item.dc:creator: @Jordiescape Jordiescape
item.description:
@Jordiescape wrote:

public int duelWith = 0; // Is an Integer, wich holds values up to 2147,000,000. (Or something like that.) public int duelStatus = -1; // Is an Integer, wich holds values up to 2147,000,000. (Or something like that.) public int duelChatStage = -1;// Is an Integer, wich holds values up to 2147,000,000. (Or something like that.) public int duelChatTimer = -1;// Is an Integer, wich holds values up to 2147,000,000. (Or something like that.) public int duelItems[] = new int[28]; // Is an Integer array, holding up to 28 integer values. public int duelItemsN[] = new int[28]; // Is an Integer array, holding up to 28 integer values. public int otherDuelItems[] = new int[28]; // Is an Integer array, holding up to 28 integer values. public int otherDuelItemsN[] = new int[28]; // Is an Integer array, holding up to 28 integer values. public boolean duelRule[] = new boolean[28]; // Is an Boolean array, holding up to 28 Boolean values. public boolean winDuel = false; // Is a boolean. (True/false values) public boolean startDuel = false; // Is a boolean. (True/false values)

item.title: Need help with this code
item.dc:creator: @w_h_i_p_z w h i p z
item.description:
@w_h_i_p_z wrote:

I am trying to add dueling to the server i have. I went looking for dueling upon my files and this is what i found. can anyone explain this? i found it in the “player” file. is this where the dueling would be? please help me. thanks!

public int duelWith = 0;
public int duelStatus = -1; // 0 = Requesting duel, 1 = in duel screen, 2 = waiting for other player to accept, 3 = in duel, 4 = won
public int duelChatStage = -1;
public int duelChatTimer = -1;
public int duelItems[] = new int[28];
public int duelItemsN[] = new int[28];
public int otherDuelItems[] = new int[28];
public int otherDuelItemsN[] = new int[28];
public boolean duelRule[] = new boolean[28];
public boolean winDuel = false;
public boolean startDuel = false;

Read full topic
